question:
Which among the following events took place during the viceroyship of Lord Reading?
1. Visva-Bharati University was established
2. Kakori Conspiracy took place
3. Communist Party of India was founded
4. C.R. Das died
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Visva-Bharati University was established in the year 1921. Kakori Conspiracy took place in Uttar Pradesh in 1925. The Communist Party of India was founded in Kanpur 1925 (25th December). C.R. Das died in 1925 in Darjeeling (West Bengal).
